nl.esciencecenter.esight.io.netcdf

Class NetCDFUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.io.netcdf.NetCDFUtil

  • public class NetCDFUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Stand-alone class that facilitates reading from NetCDF files and getting some information from collections of such files.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

      • getData

        public static ucar.ma2.Array getData(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                     java.lang.String varName)
                              throws NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
        Static function to get specific data from a netcdf dataset file. Generates a logfile error if there was an IOException during the read.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The file to get data from.
        varName - The Netcdf variable to read from the data file.
        Returns:
        The Netcdf Array containing the requested data.
        Throws:
        NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - if the variable was not found.

      • getUsedDimensionName

        public static java.lang.String getUsedDimensionName(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                                    java.lang.String... permutations)
                                             throws NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
        Experimental function to retrieve a used dimension name out of a list of possible permutations.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The file to check for used dimensions.
        permutations - The list of name permutations to check.
        Returns:
        The actually used name out of the list.
        Throws:
        NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - If all permutations ended up not being used.

      • getUsedDimensionNamesBySubstring

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUsedDimensionNamesBySubstring(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                                                                     java.lang.String subString)
                                                                              throws NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
        Experimental method to extract the used dimension names from a NetcdfFile by a substring in that dimension's name.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The NetcdfFile to check.
        subString - The substring to check for.
        Returns:
        The used dimension names matching the substring.
        Throws:
        NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - If no dimension name was found with the given substring.

      • getVarNames

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getVarNames(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> latCandidates,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lonCandidates)
        Experimental method to extract the used variable names from a NetcdfFile by candidate dimension names.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The file to extract the variables from.
        latCandidates - The list of candidates for the first dimension.
        lonCandidates - The list of candidates for the second dimension.
        Returns:
        The list of variable names matching at least one of both of the first and last dimension names given.

      • getFancyVarName

        public static java.lang.String getFancyVarName(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                               java.lang.String varName)
        Static method to extract the full name of a Netcdf variable.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The NetcdfFile to extract the information from.
        varName - The shorthand variable name.
        Returns:
        The full variable name.

      • getUsedDimensionsBySubstring

        public static ucar.nc2.Dimension[] getUsedDimensionsBySubstring(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                                                java.lang.String subString)
                                                         throws NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
        Experimental method to extract the used dimensions from a NetcdfFile by a substring in that dimension's name.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The NetcdfFile to check.
        subString - The substring to check for.
        Returns:
        The used dimensions matching the substring.
        Throws:
        NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - If no dimension name was found with the given substring.

      • getQualifyingVariables

        public static ucar.nc2.Variable[] getQualifyingVariables(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                                         ucar.nc2.Dimension[] latCandidates,
                                         ucar.nc2.Dimension[] lonCandidates)
        Experimental method to extract the used variable names from a NetcdfFile by candidate dimensions.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The file to extract the variables from.
        latCandidates - The list of candidates for the first dimension.
        lonCandidates - The list of candidates for the second dimension.
        Returns:
        The list of variable names matching at least one of both of the first and last dimensions given.

      • getUsedDimensionNames

        public static java.lang.String[] getUsedDimensionNames(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                                       java.lang.String... permutations)
                                                throws NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
        Experimental method to extract the used dimensions from a NetcdfFile based on permutations of dimension names.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The NetcdfFile to check.
        permutations - The permutations to check for.
        Returns:
        The used dimensions matching the permutations.
        Throws:
        NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - If no dimension name was found among the permutations.

      • getVarNames

        public static java.lang.String[] getVarNames(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                             java.lang.String... mandatoryDims)
        Experimental method to extract the used variable names from a NetcdfFile by mandatory dimension names.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The file to extract the variables from.
        mandatoryDims - The list of mandatory dimension names for the variables to have.
        Returns:
        The list of variable names matching all mandatory dimensions.

      • getVarNames

        public static java.lang.String[] getVarNames(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                             java.lang.String[] latCandidates,
                             java.lang.String[] lonCandidates)
        Experimental method to extract the used variable names from a NetcdfFile by candidate dimension names.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The file to extract the variables from.
        latCandidates - The list of candidates for the first dimension.
        lonCandidates - The list of candidates for the second dimension.
        Returns:
        The array of variable names matching at least one of both of the first and last dimension names given.

      • getDataSubset

        public static ucar.ma2.Array getDataSubset(ucar.nc2.NetcdfFile ncfile,
                           java.lang.String varName,
                           java.lang.String subsections)
                                    throws NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
        Experimental method to get a subset of the data, denoted by the variable name and a subsection according to the Netcdf format for specifying these subsections.
        Parameters:
        ncfile - The NetcdfFile to extract the data from.
        varName - The name of the variable to extract.
        subsections - The netcdf format string for specification of subsections.
        Returns:
        The subsection of data.
        Throws:
        NetCDFNoSuchVariableException

                       java.lang.String[] accExts)
        Check whether the file's extension is acceptable.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to check.
        accExts - The list of acceptable extensions.
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        initialFile - The file to get the predecessor of.
        Returns:
        The file that is the predecessor of the given file in the sequence.

      • getSeqFile

        public static java.io.File getSeqFile(java.io.File initialFile,
                      int value)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Getter for a file in a sequence of files, that corresponds to a certain sequence number.
        Parameters:
        initialFile - Any file in the sequence.
        value - The sequence number of the file to get.
        Returns:
        The file corresponding to the sequence number given, that is in the sequence denoted by the initial file given.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was no file in the sequence with the given sequence number.

        public static java.io.File getSeqNextFile(java.io.File initialFile)
        Getter for the next file in the sequence denoted by the file given.
        Parameters:
        initialFile - Any file in the sequence.
        Returns:
        The next file in the sequence.
